name: I Tried to make you Immortal, you tried to make me a KILLER
description: I tried to make you Immortal you tried to make me a KILLER  is the second full length release from A Midnight Tragedy.  This album was produced by Wil Francis of Aiden and William Control.  Get your physical copy right here!

name: Reinventing The End
description: This is the debut Album from A Midnight Tragedy with such classic hits as "The Last Slowdance" "Coffins and Caskets" and "Dead at The Door".  This is the album that started it all!  Get your copy today!

name: I tried to make you Immortal, you tried to make me a KILLER package #2
description: This package is pretty cool.  It's not too different from the first package but it's still pretty cool.  With this package you will receive an autographed copy of "...KILLER", a one of a kind hand made silk screened shirt designed by AMT frontman Dallas Destruction and you will receive an exclusive acoustic e.p featuring song's off both the original album "Reinventing The End" as well as songs off of "...KILLER".  #areyouaKILLER

options.name: T-shirt Sizes: S, M, L, XL

name: I tried to make you Immortal, you tried to make me a KILLER package #3
description:
Ok so this is basically the Ultimate Package!  Unfortunately, this package is only available for Tri-State Area KILLERS for the time being.  With that being said here is what this package offers...

1. Autographed copy of "...KILLER"

2. Handmade custom t-shirt designed by AMT Frontman Dallas Destruction

3. Exclusive Limited addition Acoustic E.P featuring songs off of both albums.

4. Autographed AMT poster

5. Autographed Copy of debut AMT album "Reinventing The End" 
(first 10 people only)

6. All Access to any AMT show of your choice in the Tri-State Area for one year, (21+ shows require ID)

7. Book AMT for any event you choose, birthdays, charity, show, weddings etc...

8. Have lunch with AMT (NJ,NYC ONLY)

options.name: T-shirt sizes: S, M, L, XL

name: I tried to make you Immortal, you tried to make me a KILLER package #4
description:
This is simply a build your own package deal allowing you to actually create your own package out of all the great things we offered in the original 3 packages.  Here are the items you can choose from to build your own package.  Limit 5 items per custom package...

1. Autographed copy of "...KILLER"

2. Autographed copy of "Reinventing the End" (first 10 orders only)

3. Autographed Limited edition Acoustic E.P

4. Autographed Poster

5. Handmade custom AMT shirt designed by AMT frontman Dallas Destruction

6. Lunch with AMT (tri-state area only)

7. All access to any AMT show for up to one year (tri-state area only, 21+ shows require valid I.D)

8. Book AMT for private event, birthday,charity, show, etc... (tri-state area only)

*** Again remember for this package there is a limit to 5 items per person.  #areyouaKILLER
